hero.title: Your AI. Your Solutions.

services.subtitle: Comprehensive AI solutions tailored to your needs

contentGeneration.title: Content Generation
contentGeneration.description: Harness the power of AI to create high-quality content. From marketing copy to technical documentation – we automate your content creation process.

automation.title: Automations
automation.description: We build custom automation solutions that streamline workflows, reduce errors, and boost your team's productivity.

consulting.title: AI Consulting
consulting.description: Professional consulting on AI strategy. We help identify opportunities, develop action plans, and implement AI solutions in your organization.

development.title: Software Development
development.description: Full-stack development services: frontend, backend, Python and TypeScript scripts. We create scalable solutions tailored to your requirements.

about.title: About the Studio
about.description: Wojciech Turek Studio AI specializes in creating innovative solutions powered by artificial intelligence. We combine programming expertise with customer relations experience to deliver solutions that are not only technologically advanced but also intuitive and practical.
